title: Clean up duplicate project tasks
description: Identify and remove duplicate tasks across similar project IDs, reorganize task IDs, and consolidate projects where appropriate.

title: Test JSON Parsing Fix
description: Successfully tested the JSON parsing fix for the cleanup_tasks tool. The fixes implemented for the getProjectConfig function, config override mechanism, and execute function are working correctly. The tool ran without any JSON parsing errors when performing all cleanup operations (cleanOrphans, detectDuplicates, enforceQuality, fixMetadata, reorganizeIds).

title: Test Error Handling
description: This subtask tests the error handling mechanisms implemented in the MCP server. It verifies that the server can properly recover from communication errors and continue operating.

title: Test Message Formatting
description: This subtask tests the message formatting functionality implemented in the MCP server. It verifies that the server can properly format JSON-RPC messages and handle missing methods.
